start_onboarding_1:
üëã Welcome to Matplobbot!

I'm here to help you with programming libraries, LaTeX, and more. Let's take a quick tour of my features.
start_onboarding_2:
üìö First, you can browse and search your personal collection of notes from GitHub repositories.

Let's add your first repository to get started!
start_onboarding_3:
Great! Now you can use `/lec_all` to browse it or `/lec_search` to find content inside it.

Next up: I have a built-in library of code examples from `matplobblib`.
start_onboarding_4: You can also render complex math formulas with LaTeX or create diagrams with Mermaid.js right here in the chat.
start_onboarding_5:
That's it! You're all set.

All these features and more are available from the main menu. Feel free to explore!
help_intro:
This is a bot for finding code examples from the matplobblib library.

Click a button to execute a command:
repo_add_already_exists: ‚ö†Ô∏è Repository `{repo_path}` is already in your list.
repo_add_invalid_format: ‚ùå Invalid format. Please use the `owner/repository` format.
repo_edit_prompt: Send the new name for repository `{old_repo_path}` (in `owner/repo` format):
latex_prompt: Please send your formula in LaTeX syntax (outer `$...` are optional):
latex_render_error:
Could not render the formula.

**Error:**
```
{error}
```

Please ensure the syntax is correct.
mermaid_prompt: Please send your diagram code in Mermaid syntax:
matp_all_show_error: Error: code information is outdated. Please start over with /matp_all.
github_download_error: Failed to download or send file `{file_name}`. Error: {error}
github_fetch_exception: An error occurred while loading the file: {error}
github_pdf_error: An error occurred while creating the PDF file: {error}. Sending as plain text.
github_html_error: An error occurred while creating the HTML file: {error}. Sending as plain text.
github_repo_content_error: Could not get repository contents. There might be an issue with the GitHub token or API.
favorites_empty: You don't have any favorite examples yet. You can add them by clicking the '‚≠ê Add to Favorites' button under a code example.
favorites_info_outdated: Error: Favorite item information is outdated. Please use /favorites again.
search_prompt_library: Enter keywords to search for code examples:
search_no_results:
No results found for your query '{query}'.
Try different keywords or use /matp_all to browse.
search_results_outdated: Search results are outdated. Please perform the search again.
search_invalid_result: Invalid search result. It might be outdated.
github_no_repos_configured: You have no repositories configured for browsing. Please add them in /settings.
github_file_info_outdated: Error: File information is outdated. Please refresh the navigation.
github_search_prompt: Enter a query to search in repository `{repo_path}`:
github_choose_repo_search: Select a repository to search in:
github_search_error: An error occurred during the search. Please try again later.
github_search_no_results: Nothing was found for your query '{query}'.
github_search_results_found:
Found {count} files in `{repo_path}` for query '{query}'.
Page {page}/{total_pages}:
help_menu_header:
This is a bot for finding code examples from the matplobblib library.

Click a button to execute a command:
help_already_in_menu: You are already in the help menu.
show_code_error: Could not find or display this code example. It may have been deleted or moved.
admin_no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
admin_update_finished: Update complete. Choose the next command:
admin_clear_cache_success: ‚úÖ All application cache has been successfully cleared.
admin_clear_cache_finished: Cache clearing complete. Choose the next command:
